All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Collapse
    Provides implementation of collapse operation and a method for reading JSON file containing collapsed and extended versions of phrases.
    Expand
    Provides implementation of expand operation and a method for reading JSON file containing collapsed and extended versions of phrases.
    Identity  
    Inverse
    Class extending TextDecorator, it performs action of inverting text.
    NumberToText
    Class extending TextDecorator, it handles transforming number written in digits to number written in words.
    TextDecorator  
    TextTransform  
    TextTransformer
    This is just an example to show that the logic should be outside the REST service.
    TextTransformerApplication  
    TextTransformerController  
    UnknownTransform  
    Upper
    Provides implementation of upper operation which transforms whole text to upper case.
